amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 115-259 as en bloc No 2: 29, 30, 33, 34, 45, 47, 48, 66, 67, 68, and 69.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Simpson amendments (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
